subject: Initial discovery call
description: Discussed current CRM pain points and requirements. John mentioned they need better reporting capabilities and integration with their existing tools.

subject: Training proposal sent
description: Sent detailed proposal for sales training program including curriculum outline and pricing structure.

subject: Support requirements meeting
description: Met with Michael to discuss their support needs. They require 24/7 coverage and dedicated account management.

subject: Growth strategy discussion
description: Emily outlined their growth plans and scaling challenges. They need a comprehensive solution to support their expansion.

subject: Project kickoff completed
description: Successful kickoff meeting with the Enterprise Solutions team. Project timeline established and resources allocated.

subject: Digital transformation proposal
description: Sent comprehensive proposal for digital transformation including phased implementation plan and ROI projections.

subject: Competitor analysis
description: Research shows our solution offers better integration capabilities compared to main competitors. Key differentiator for TechCorp deal.

subject: Budget confirmation
description: Confirmed budget approval with Sarah. Ready to move forward with contract negotiations.
